divs: sighting detailsmonsoon season between late july\august. i was 34\35 (?) yrs old at the time. i was taking care of my daughter and our neighbors children. my daughter was appx. 8\9. the other girls were 13-15 consecutively. we can get more info from the eldest child as she witnessed and reported the craft more thoroughly at the time of the sighting as the others recall no such sighting. monsoon season is very beautiful and fantastic in the high mountain platueau of new mexico. i lived in an adobe home on a half acre with a direct view of the sandia mountains, a view encompassing the rio grande as well. it was very typical to leave the doors open to the house open during the monsoon season as it cooled off the indoors. my daughter and one of the neighbor children were seated on the brick floor of the house playing a board game when i was attracted to the beautiful lights and colors of the rain\thunder storms so typical of the area at that time of year. the eldest of the children went out front to the patio, which was\is unobstructed from the front room where the children were playing and just stood and watched the beautiful stormy sky. i joined her seconds later and we remarked how "cool" the sky looked. then, to our left, approximately 50 yds above, directly over the t wooden power pole, i saw what looked like a circular object that had a blue neon light at its base. like a round neon light. it made no sound!! it did not vibrate. it did not hum. it was just there. i understand the value of empirical evidence and so i asked the 15 yr old, "what do you see?" she said, "just what you see." i said, "no, tell me what you see." she said, as the object was still there, that she saw a blue bottomed something and that it was real quiet. something to that effect. i will have her make a seperate statement. anyway, at that time, when we both agreed upon what we saw, it just disappeared or moved away really quickly. we couldn't understand which, it was just gone. there was still storm activity going on and we just looked at each other like, wtf was that. i have personally tried to not have her recount the episode so that her, at the time, young unbiased mind would not be affected. but there have been other episodes since. as far as sightings. no abductions to my waking knowledge. there have been several as i call them "chevrons, deltas, big huge soundless,slow moving crafts'" over my house in nm.
Summary: neon blue light at "bottom" of disc. gray colored above the neon blue.
